text: What led us to use Cloud services?
Let's start with our complexity:

400 offices spread
across all regions of Italy,

we have a wide spectrum
of relationships

with administration fragmentation,
which is typical in our country.

We need to rationalize
internal and external processes,
to be agile in our structure.

Therefore, the only way
to initiate internal processes

and then end up
with the best patient service,
as its own patient experience,

was indeed the transition
to a Cloud infrastructure,
like the one you are proposing.
The role of Link App can be summed up

in the concept of excellence
that we are looking for in our area.

Cerba has always started
its own investments

looking for structures that
are specialized in treating patients,

and these structures, in turn,
looked for partners
that were excellent in our area.

So, since the very beginning
Link App did its part

in working with us towards an idea
of digitization of Health,

digitization of Health that certainly
starts with the infrastructure.

So, having Link App
alongside us means
fine-tuning a well-defined strategy

from a structural IT,
digital and service point of view.

The long-term goal, well, I like
to talk about the medium-term goal.

And why not
the short-term goal?

Because we are fanatics
of patient experience,

to be able to give the patient
a diagnostic path

like the one we have in mind,
we have to work on all processes.
Therefore, an organization

that brings together
all the territorial complexity

that we interact with
on a daily basis.
Then to arrive at a simplification,
a speeding up of the development,

thus giving the patient
a single path,
based on all diagnostic needs

and also all necessities related
to relationships with doctors,
with healthcare personnel,

with organizational structures
that make the path to health unique.
